mapper.insert: insert into t_user_cash_record_detail ( cash_id, cash_status, note, remark, cre_date, cre_time, create_by) values ( #{map.cash_id}, #{map.cash_status}, #{map.note}, #{map.remark}, #{map.cre_date}, #{map.cre_time}, #{map.create_by})
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.order_id, t.user_id, t.org_no, t.org_name, t.account_type, t.cash_money, t.cash_actual_money, t.feet_rate, t.rate_feet_money, t.single_feet_money, t.deduct_money, t.account, t.account_name, t.id_card, t.bank_code, t.bank_name, t.batch_no, t.status, t.remark, t.update_by, DATE_FORMAT( STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(t.cre_date, t.cre_time), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS cre_date, DATE_FORMAT( STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(t.up_date, t.up_time), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS up_date, t1.manager_id, t1.user_tel, t1.real_name FROM t_user_cash_record t LEFT JOIN t_user_info t1 ON t.user_id = t1.id where t.id = #{cash_id}
